# accessibilityException | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

- [ NSExceptionName ](/documentation/foundation/nsexceptionname)

- [ accessibilityException ](/documentation/foundation/nsexceptionname/accessibilityexception)

- [ NSExceptionName ](/documentation/foundation/nsexceptionname)

-  accessibilityException 

Type Property# accessibilityException

macOS 10.1–10.11Deprecated

```
static let accessibilityException: NSExceptionName
```

Deprecated

Exceptions are no longer appropriate for indicating errors in accessibility API. Unexpected values should be handled through appropriate type checking.

## [See Also](/documentation/foundation/nsexceptionname/accessibilityexception#see-also)
